method.name: _addperiod::
method.comment: Adds a Period to the given date instance. Do not forget to assign the result.

method.name: _getdayofweekname:
method.comment: Returns the day of week name. Similar to DateTime.GetDayOfWeek which returns the day of week as an integer.

method.name: _getdaysnames
method.comment: Returns a list with the week days names, using the device set locale.

method.name: _getmonthname:
method.comment: Returns the month name of the given date. Similar To DateTime.GetMonth which returns the month as an integer.

method.name: _getmonthsnames
method.comment: Returns a list with the months names, using the device set locale.

method.name: _issameday::
method.comment: Tests whether the two ticks values represent the same day.

method.name: _numberofdaysinmonth::
method.comment: Returns the number of days in the given month

method.name: _periodbetween::
method.comment: Calculates the period between two date instances. This method returns a Period type with years, months, days, hours, minutes, seconds.

method.name: _periodbetweenindays::
method.comment: Calculates the period between two date instances. This method returns a Period type with days, hours, minutes, seconds

method.name: _setdate:::
method.comment: Returns the ticks value of the given date (the time will be 00:00:00).

method.name: _setdateandtime::::::
method.comment: Returns the ticks value of the given date and time

method.name: _setdateandtime2:::::::
method.comment: Returns the ticks value of the given date and time with the specified time zone offset. The last parameter is the time zone offset measured in hours.

method.name: _tickstounixtime:
method.comment: Converts ticks value to unix time.

method.name: _unixtimetoticks:
method.comment: Converts unix time to ticks value.

class.name: b4i_persiancalendar
class.designerProperty: Key: fontname, DisplayName: FontName, FieldType: String, Description: Font name exist in dir asset ,DefaultValue:
Key: headerfontcolor, DisplayName: HeaderTextColor, FieldType: Color, Description: Set color for header textcolor,DefaultValue: #FF000000
Key: headerbgcolor, DisplayName: HeaderBackColor, FieldType: Color, Description: Set color for header background color,DefaultValue: #FFFFFFFF
Key: headerfontsize, DisplayName: HeaderTextSize, FieldType: Int, Description: Set font size for header text,DefaultValue: 14
Key: itemfontcolor, DisplayName: DaysTextColor, FieldType: Color, Description: Set color for days textcolor,DefaultValue: #FF000000
Key: itembgcolor, DisplayName: DaysBackColor, FieldType: Color, Description: Set color for days background color,DefaultValue: #FFEFEFEF
Key: itemgridcolor, DisplayName: DaysGridColor, FieldType: Color, Description: Set grid color for days,DefaultValue: #FFFFFFFF
Key: itemgridcorner, DisplayName: DaysGridCorner, FieldType: Int, Description: Add corner for day item,DefaultValue: 1
Key: itemfontsize, DisplayName: DaysTextSize, FieldType: Int, Description: Set font size for days text,DefaultValue: 14
Key: selectedday, DisplayName: SelectedDayBackColor, FieldType: Color, Description: Set background color for selected day with user,DefaultValue: #FFB7B7B7
Key: selecteddaytextcolor, DisplayName: SelectedDayTextColor, FieldType: Color, Description: Set text color for selected day with user,DefaultValue: #FF2C2C2C
Key: selecteddayisbold, DisplayName: SelectedDayBold, FieldType: Boolean, Description: Bold the selected day with user,DefaultValue: True
Key: fridaycolor, DisplayName: Friday TextColor, FieldType: Color, change all friday textcolor,DefaultValue: #FFB71A1A
Key: short_days, DisplayName: ShowShortDayName, FieldType: Boolean, Description: Show S instead of sunday,DefaultValue: True

method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _setdate:::
method.comment: Set day to 0 for dont show day in calendar Please send shamsi date

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initializes the fields to their default value.

field.name: IsInitialized
field.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.
